name: Blob Extractor
description: Binary Ninja plugin for extracting files from container formats
longdescription: Blob Extractor is a Binary Ninja plugin that leverages the Unblob API to identify and extract compressed archives, file-systems, and other blobs embedded in container binaries such as flash dumps or firmware images.

installinstructions.Darwin:
Install the following pip packages: unblob, python-magic

Install the following brew packages: libmagic

Install required external extractor utilities
installinstructions.Linux:
Install the following pip packages: ublob, python-magic

Install the following apt packages: libmagic1

Install required external extractor utilities

author: Vector 35 Inc.
